comment: "When we go low, we kick 'em. That's what this new Democratic Party is all about." Eric Holder. Whoa, ok then. And i spose they, the people that bring false rape accusations to a Supreme Court nominee confirmation hearing, are going to be the ones to define what 'go low' means. Scary. Bolshevism is around the corner in the US now. These people are animals and their teeth are being bared. When they bare them, should we 'kick 'em'?
